title: Some tough poses to find with a mid-tier back and a few others
author: Luke

posts.post_title: Some tough poses to find with a mid-tier back and a few others
posts.post_content:
Prices include shipping and insurance and assume a no-fee payment method. PP Goods plus 3.5% is also fine. I have to collect sales tax from WA state buyers.
